Name: Liquorice Cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Gin tinted violet, flavoured with liquorice and slightly sweetened.
History: Created in 2003 by Jason Fendick, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Liquorice Cocktail contains 169 calories
